assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bhartiya International Limited manufactures and sells leather and textile products in India. It offers leather outerwear, bags and accessories, belts, wallets, and other small leather goods, as well as leather finishing services. The company also engages in the development of real estate and industrial parks. In addition, it exports its products. Bhartiya International Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Gurugram, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Govindan  Raghavan
companyOfficers.title: Chief Exec. Officer of Bhartiya City Developers Private Limited

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Amrishpal P. Singh Narag
companyOfficers.title: MD of J&J Leather Enterprises Ltd. and Director of Bhartiya International Sez Ltd.
